meanings.definition: A person who discerns or perceives something.
meanings.sent1: The discerners in the group noticed the hidden message.
meanings.sent2: The discerners at the art gallery appreciated the subtle brushstrokes.
meanings.sent3: The discerners at the party were quick to spot the prankster hiding behind the door.
meanings.sent4: She was like a discerners, able to see through the lies with ease.
meanings.sent5: The discerners in the forest could hear the faint rustling of leaves from afar.

meanings.definition: Those who have the ability to distinguish or recognize differences.
meanings.sent1: The discerners in the tasting panel could identify the unique flavors in each dish.
meanings.sent2: The discerners in the crowd could tell the real painting from the replica.
meanings.sent3: The discerners in the class could spot the identical twins' subtle differences.
meanings.sent4: He had the eyes of a discerners, able to see the smallest variations in color.
meanings.sent5: The discerners in the group could distinguish the different bird songs in the forest.
